labels.Step5 page title: Paramètres SMTP pour envoyer les emails
labels.Congratulation! Welcome to EspoCRM: Félicitation! EspoCRM a été installé avec succès.
labels.More Information:
For more information, please visit our {BLOG}, follow us on {TWITTER}.

If you have any suggestions or questions, please ask on the {FORUM}.
labels.share: Si vous appréciez EspoCRM, partagez le avec vos amis. Faites leur connaître le produit
labels.Database Settings Description: Entrez vos informations de connexion à la base MYSQL (nom d'hôte, nom d'utilisateur et mot de passe). Vous pouvez spécifier le port serveur pour le nom d'hôte comme localhost:3306.
labels.dbName: Nom de la base de donnée
labels.dbUserName: Nom d'utilisateur de la base de données

fields.Database Name: Nom de la base de données

messages.2005: Hôte du server MYSQL est inconnu
messages.Bad init Permission:
Permission denied for "{*}" directory. Please set 775 for "{*}" or just execute this command in the terminal 
{C}
Operation not permitted? Try this one: {CSU}
messages.Failed to connect to database: Impossible de connecter la base de donnée
messages.You must agree to the license agreement: Vous devez agréer l'accord de licence
messages.Passwords do not match: Les mots de passes sont différents
messages.Enable mod_rewrite in Apache server: Activer mod_rewrite sur le serveur Apache
messages.buildDatabase error: Erreur dans la construction de la base de donnée
messages.createUser error: Erreur dans la création de l'utilisateur
messages.Thousand Separator and Decimal Mark equa: Thousand Separator and Decimal Mark cannot be equal
messages.mysqlSettingError: EspoCRM requires the MySQL setting "{NAME}" to be set to {VALUE}

apache.windows:
1. Find the httpd.conf file (usually you will find it in a folder called conf, config or something along those lines)

2. Inside the httpd.conf file uncomment the line LoadModule rewrite_module modules/mod_rewrite.so (remove the pound '#' sign from in front of the line)

3. Also find the line ClearModuleList is uncommented then find and make sure that the line AddModule mod_rewrite.c is not commented out.
apache.linux:
1. Enable "mod_rewrite". To do it run those commands in a Terminal:
{APACHE1}

2. Enable .htaccess support. Add/edit the Server configuration settings (/etc/apache/apache2.conf, /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf):
{APACHE2}
Afterwards run this command in a Terminal:
{APACHE3}

3. Try to add the RewriteBase path, open a file {API_PATH}.htaccess and replace the following line:
{APACHE4}
To
{APACHE5}

For more information please visit the guideline Apache server configuration for EspoCRM.

modRewriteTitle.apache:
API Error: EspoCRM API is unavailable.
Possible problems: disabled "mod_rewrite" in Apache server, disabled .htaccess support or RewriteBase issue.
Do only necessary steps. After each step check if the issue is solved.
modRewriteTitle.nginx:
API Error: EspoCRM API is unavailable.
Add this code to your Nginx server block config file (/etc/nginx/sites-available/YOUR_SITE) inside "server" section:
modRewriteTitle.microsoft-iis:
API Error: EspoCRM API is unavailable.
Possible problem: disabled "URL Rewrite". Please check and enable "URL Rewrite" Module in IIS server
modRewriteTitle.default:
API Error: EspoCRM API is unavailable.
Possible problem: disabled Rewrite Module. Please check and enable Rewrite Module in your server (e.g. mod_rewrite in Apache) and .htaccess support.
